Articles.Content:
This story is adapted from my English class story called The Titan Adventure

The charecters are;

Captain Jeb Kerman a professional air force pilot and astronaut

Commander Bob Thoron a comm officer for the navy and the kerbin space station

Private Aldey Scot a demoted sergeant in the army demoted for disobeying his commander by saving his commanders life

Doctor perry she is the most experienced docter on the planet she has worked with all the armed forces and the astronaut corps.

Engineer Scot served in the naval air force as an engineer on aircraft carriers aswell as many jets

I will try to post regular updates but as im 14 i have school and i may forget.

Prologue

The year is 2214, 190 years after the first Duna manned landing. When Kerbals first settled on Duna they found the remains of an old advanced civilization that went extinct over 2,000 years ago. when our scientists investigated the ruins they found plans for a high powered thruster that could decrease travel time significantly. They also discovered an experimental artificial gravity. As they searched more of the ruins for the valuable technology. After three weeks of searching the ruins they finally gave up and decided to go back to base. On the way back to the base a scientist sighted an old ship they all went over to it and inspected it. They discovered two more plans one for a force-field and the other for a laser weapon.

Edited June 10, 2014 by Commander Jebidiah

Chapter 1: The Orion Revealed

It was early morning, Jeb Kerman had just woken up and turned on the TV, the news channel was on.

"Today the Kerbin Exploration Society completed constructio of the KES Orion, an armed exploration cruiser. Captain Jeb Kerman will be taking command of the Orion, assisted by Bob Thoron and Private Aldey Scot. The Orion will leave Medium Kerbin Orbit and proceed to jool for exploration of the surface of Laythe. Thats all we have on space now we have the wea..."

Jeb turned the TV off. He walked to the kitchen grabbed a bowl of cereal-K and sat on his couch and ate.
